thread.title: U.S. may tighten grip on China ties to hi-tech

title: U.S. may tighten grip on China ties to hi-tech
text:
U.S. may tighten grip on China ties to hi-tech 01:56
The U.S. government may start scrutinizing informal partnerships between American and Chinese companies in the field of artificial intelligence, threatening practices that have long been considered garden variety development work for tech companies, sources familiar with the discussions said.
The U.S. government may start scrutinizing informal partnerships between American and Chinese companies in the field of artificial intelligence, threatening practices that have long been considered garden variety development work for tech companies, sources familiar with the discussions said. //reut.rs/2FmHWJ1
